description: Returns information about a specified run of a workflow.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow run. To retrieve a list of workflow run IDs, use  ListWorkflowRuns.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the workflow run.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the workflow run.

nested_items.name: statusReasons
nested_items.description: Information about the reasons for the status of the workflow run.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow run began, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow run ended, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the workflow run status was last updated, in coordinated universal time (UTC) timestamp format as specified in RFC 3339
